title: Great breakfast and great service!
text: Joseph , the concierge of our hotel, Riva Palace, recommended this restaurant, so we went. The breakfast was just delicious and the service first clase. Beside it was very close to our hotel.Thank you Joseph!

title: Interesting!!!!
text:
A must see when visiting Sofía!
We took a tour with City Tour company and this was one of the sites that we went to.
place: The Rotunda Church of St George

title: We will always remember you...the best!
text:
Months before our trip to Sofía,Bulgaria we learned about Este Spa through the Intercontinental Sofía hotel to whom we are deeply grateful for this amazing recommendation.
Since we were not sure if we were going to be arriving in Sofía at the time scheduled by our air line, the Este Spa reception showed flexibility and told us to call them when we arrived to the hotel and so we did.
They took us one hour earlier than we thought and the most relaxing and pleasurable journey started.
We booked a Este Royal treatment that includes an absolutely amazing Hammam ritual and the most delicious and relaxing 4 hands massaging in sync and harmony.
We became one.
We were just in heaven!!!
THANK YOU!
Not only that the Hammam room is gorgeous and circular but the whole place is beautifully and artistically done and the attention to detail is exquisite with a five star service .
We have had massages in different parts of the world and this one is far and beyond the best.
We will always remember this extraordinary experience and the wonderful people that made it possible!
THANK YOU AGAIN!

title: Excellent service!
text:
Our room was very clean, the bed was very cozy and the bathroom was spacious with a wonderful shower!
The hotel has a top bar area with great views of the city.
Breakfast was delicious with multiple options.
The train station is about 15 minutes walk from the hotel and also the metro station to go to the city center, that is just 3 metro stops away and cost 4 euros round trip.
The reception serves also as concierge and they really were far and beyond making reservation for us to go to Slovakia by boat.THANK YOU!

title: Just lovely!
text:
We loved walking in the city center and observing the beautiful surroundings, the buildings, the details of the structures, the expressive faces of the sculptures, the people enjoying their selves.
It really is amazing how many buildings are preserved for us to enjoy them.

title: A must visit!
text:
The Imperial Palace is majestic, massive and beautiful!
Looking at the faces of the sculptures we felt the feelings that the master wanted to communicate, they are expressive and pieces of art.
We loved walking and enjoying the details everywhere!

title: Beautiful!!!
text:
Huge and impressive !
The St Stephen’s cathedral is a place that we want to visit if we are in Vienna. It is beautiful inside and out and has a special majestic feeling.

title: Great food and fine service!
text:
Located in Korcula island, in a beautiful boulevard at the ocean side!
We loved the food, the wine, the service and the view of the blue ocean from our table, even the breeze was fresh and welcoming.

title: Delicious food!
text: We had a delicious lunch at this very elegant and fine restaurant. The atmosphere is fresh and happy. The service was exquisite!

title: Remarkable and beyond expectations!
text:
We stayed at the fantastic Intercontinental Sofía, Bulgaria.
We had booked online, months in advance, a tour to the Rila Monastery and we were to be picked up at the hotel lobby at 9 am. At 9:20 we asked the concierge to please call the tour company. They said they had canceled the tour and that they had sent us a cancellation email the day before which we never received.
Our remarkable concierge, Todor, immediately called to V TOUR company and the owner, Victor, came personally to get us and drove us to their bus that was already in the way to the monastery...WOW!!
They REALLY WENT BEYOND EXPECTATIONS!
They literally made our day so wonderful ! We had a fantastic and happy tour because they really CARE about the feelings of other people which is an attitude to be emulated.
FROM OUR HEARTS...THANK YOU!
Be your heart and life fulfilled with love, peace, joy, abundance and freedom!
We will always remember you!
J&L

title: Wonderful service and great food!
text:
We stayed at the Monte Cristo Hotel inside of old town Kotor.
Eating at the Luna Rossa our delicious breakfast was a relaxing and peaceful experience.
We also had dinner in one occasion and loved the flavors and again the great service!
Thanks, we remember your generous smiles!!!

title: We love it!
text:
We took a train, 1:05 hour from Vienna to Bratislava.
When we arrived we took a bus to the to the old town and were very pleased to see that they were having a beautiful festival at the castle and also at the main square.
The place felt surrendered with a very soft and happy energy.
We eat a delicious dinner and were very happy to be there.
Take look of the train schedule so you plan accordingly.

title: Great food and service!
text: After a long day tour to Rila Monastery we found this wonderful restaurant in Sofia where the service was great, the food was delicious and we had refreshing drinks...Yeah!

title: It is very beautiful and precious!
text:
We enjoyed our tour to the Rila Monastery very much.
We saw a video before traveling and being there only confirmed why we were so attracted to it.
It is really very beautiful and the mountains that surround the monastery give to the place a special feeling.
We went to the top of the church and the views from there are amazing!

title: Very interesting !
text:
They will let you be inside of this old church for about 10 minutes and still we feel it was worthy to go.
There are many frescos to enjoy and admire.

title: Ivan was the best tour guide!
text:
City tour.
It was wonderful to walk the city and discover many beautiful buildings and understand better the history of this amazing civilization!
Out city tour guide, Ivan, has so much knowledge, he is highly educated and friendly and speaks perfect English. We really enjoyed our time with him...THANKS Ivan! We will remember you with gratitude!

title: Love it!
text:
We stayed at the Intercontinental Sofía , so this beautiful cathedral was very close and we enjoyed it very much.
It really is very beautiful, specially outside!

title: Prefect service and accommodations!
text:
The hotel staff was very attentive to any of our needs and desires. The concierge helped us to book a tour, and he did it in minutes and immediately after a tour we bought online was last minute canceled.THANK YOU!! You made possible our visit to the Rila Monastery and we had a wonderful day!
Breakfast was delicious and plenty.
Our bed was so, so cozy and confortable!
The location is just perfect.
Also the concierge helped us to book the most amazing 4 hands massage and Hamman at the Este Spa where we were in heaven.
They booked for us a fantastic meal experience at the Water Mill restaurant in the mountains.
The view from our room was wonderful!
We will always remember with love and gratitude our stay in this fantastic hotel.

title: What a precious little island!
text:
What a pleasure to be in this little island turned out to be!
Coming from Split, on our way to Plitvice, we decided to stop for lunch in Trogir without suspecting how charming and gracious this old town is... we could had spent at least one night / full day here!
Gorgeous!
Also, no far from there there is a view point from where we saw Split , Trogir and amazing ocean views, WOW!

title: So worthy!
text: It is about 2 kilometers walk, and the views of the old town and the ocean are spectacular, this a must do!

title: Si lovely to walk in this place
text: We stayed inside de walls of the old town, in the Domnius Little Palace, that is very close to the Stradun, so we were able to enjoy its festive environment all the time. We just loved being in there.

title: It is precious, just wonderful!
text:
Since we stayed inside the walls of the all city at the precious Domnius Little Palace, perfectly located, we walked and enjoyed wonderful nooks of the old town, delicious food, ice cream and when we needed a break it was easy to lay down in our cozy bed and come back out to continue searching after resting.
We walked the 2 kilometers on the top of the walls, all around the old town, with marvelous views and we did it around 4 :30 pm with great fresh breeze! This is a must do when in Dubrovnik. We felt in love with this charming place!

title: Wonderful staff and location!
text:
Mírela and the hotel staff were so wonderful and always looking for ways to help us to find the best tours and restaurants!
The room was small and precious and clean, the bed was comfortable.
Sometimes we could hear people talking in the street but not after 11 pm.
The best location, inside the walls and close to everything!
THANK YOU for all your attention and great service!

title: Beautiful place!
text:
This is the center of the Diocletian palace and every night there is entertainment and we enjoyed the music and have fun here.
From here, going to a relative small tunnel, we went to the outside promenade that had plam trees and restaurants and the port.
Just precious!

title: Delicious food!!!
text:
Great service and delicious food.
Our hotel Riva Palace, located inside the Diocletian palace, made the reservation for us...THANK YOU!
Book ahead!

title: Love it!
text:
The Diocletian palace is inside of the old Split town. Outside the walls there is a big beautiful promenade full of palm trees, restaurants and life!
Also the port is just there in front of the promenade.
Waking around was amazing.
We really enjoyed Old town Split!

title: Lovely, lovely place!
text:
Built in the 4th century.
Since we stayed in the Riva Palace hotel, that is inside of the palace , we were able to enjoyed walking very much the palace.
The palace is inside of the old town of Split... it couldn’t be better!
And the Split port is just in front... we loved it!
At night there is always someone performing at the center of the palace, Peristyle, and from there there is a relative small tunnel that goes to the outside promenade, were we loved looking at the ocean and the boats coming and going.

title: A wonderland place to be when in Split!
text:
Joseph was very kind and always looking for ways to make our stay more pleasant and gave us tones of information about restaurants and places to visit., we will remember you forever...THANK YOU!
He came to the ferry dock to get us when we arrived,carried some of our bags, in the way he explained that we were going to be in the same place were the emperor lived and as we walked he described the areas of the old palace.
The hotel has 4 rooms and they are precious, first quality in everything.
The palace is inside of the old Split town so it was very easy to move around and enjoy every nook.
We also loved sitting in the Split promenade and look at the ocean and the boats come and go.
It was wonderful!

title: Great food!
text: We really enjoyed our dinner and the atmosphere in the restaurant. The staff was very attentive and we had a great time.

title: Relaxing!!!
text:
Our favorite place in old town Korcula was at the promenade which has many restaurants overlooking the blue waters. Sitting there and feeling the breeze passing trough while staring at the ocean was very relaxing and desirable.
The old town is small so we walked around many times in the day and half we were in there.
We went up the church tower to enjoyed the views from the top and it was fun!

title: Great service and confortable place!
text:
It was wonderful to be at this place !
It as very clean and the bed was very comfortable, the room is spacious and well decorated.
Being inside of the old town was a wonderful experience and it allowed us to enjoy all the nooks of it.
They waited for us at the ferry dock and helped us with the luggage, and kindly kept our bags meanwhile we walked around and had breakfast allowing us to check early.
We are extremely grateful that the owner offered to wash our clothes since we still had more traveling ahead of us...THANK YOU!

title: A fantastic and fascinating experience!
text:
We bought entrance tickets online months in advance and they sent us a voucher that we exchanged for tickets at the entrance of the park. Since we selected to get in at 9 am they gave us a window from 8:30 to 10 am to enter. We think this is a very wise way to control the amount of people in the park.
The whole process was easy and fast.
The amount of water cascades and the beauty that is everywhere is indescribable.
The sound of the water rolling is incredibly relaxing to the point that the 8 kilometers we walked were not felt at all.
We entered in entrance #1 since the place were we stayed, House Biba and Leona was 15 minutes walk away.
We chose the route C, going up 145 meters to the upper lakes so we were always facing the water cascades.
There is boat ride in a beautiful turquoise lake that has an island and there is a “train” to get back.
If you visit Croatia this park is must see.
Take a day to fully enjoy it .

title: Just perfect!
text:
The staff was fantastic, friendly and always looking for ways to enhance our stay and our visit to the park. They advised, ahead of our stay , where to buy the entrance tickets to the park...thank you!
They drove us to the restaurant and to the park even though they are within walking distance from the beautiful house.
The room is very cozy and comfortable and the breakfast was delicious and plenty.
We said goodbye with a big sincere hug hoping that we will see them again.
Thank you for making our this experience an unforgettable one!

title: The view is definitely worth the hike
text:
1,350 steps going up!
And the views along the hike keeps you highly motivated to keep going. It is a huge reward at the top!
A must do!

title: A precious and wonderful old town
text:
We were absolutely charmed by Kotor old City. We love the music , the concert, every corner and the food.
We just adored this little town by the most beautiful Kotor Bay.

title: The most wonderful views!
text: The views of Kotor bay are indescribable by words. It is spectacular and grandiose! It was the reason why we visited Montenegro and we left with the intention of coming back. This is a MUST SEE.

title: Guest focused with attention to details.
text:
The staff is excellent and were very pleasant and helpful. They booked the tours that we wanted and drove us to Dubrovnik.
Breakfast was delicious and plenty.
The room was very beautiful and specious and also the bed was very comfortable!
It really is a precious boutique hotel, which has a perfect location.
We just love it.
Thank you for your wonderful hospitality, we were very, very happy there!

title: A wonderful experience!
text: Since the moment we were picked up at the lodge to the end the staff was very professional and attentive being sure we were going to have a pleasant and safe experience, and so it was, mild waters and a lot of fun with amazing views all around us.
placeLocation: Denali National Park and Preserve, Alaska

title: Beautiful lodge in front of Denali Village
text:
Our room was very nice, cozy beds, clean and comfortable!
The food at Fannie Q Saloon was really delicious and the service was excellent!
The lodge is a cross the street from Denali village which we found very convenient.
They have a coffee shop where we got our breakfast before taking a tour.
We found this lodge very lovely!

title: A wonderful surprise!
text:
This boat trip was so wonderful !
The tour itself was fun, entertaining, and beautiful!
If you are in Fairbanks is a must do...book in advance!
We love it!

title: Fantastic service, greats views from the dome
text:
Since the moment we got in the staff was excellent, the service was impeccable , the place was very clean and the breakfast was delicious, Also the audio was very clear so we were able to understand what the guide was explaining .
It was amazing to see through the dome all our surroundings.
A great experience!
And the cost was lower than other options.

title: Beautiful views!
text:
The views from the top were beautiful and the food was very good also!
The tram was itself specious and fast.

title: Great beer and food!
text:
We got 5 or 6 small glasses of different beer to tried different flavors and we loved all of them!
The food was also very testy and plenty!

title: Efficient!
text:
Everything was easy and efficient!
The train was on time.
The depot is clean and the service was pleasant!

title: Needs attention !
text:
We booked the GoldStar Dome with Alaska Railroad from Denali to Talkeetna.
Of course the views through the dome were really great ! The dome allows for seeing all around!
It was difficult to understand the guide because the audio system used was not working well, the lunch quality didn’t match the cost of the ticket and the windows were dirty.
We also booked the Wilderness Express dome and we give them a 5 starts.

title: A really excellent service!
text:
Since the moment I contacted this agency and talked to Renea until the end of the trip their service was pleasant, courteous, on time and exactly as promised!
THANK YOU for creating with us a wonderful and unforgettable in land journey in Alaska.

title: Great family concert!
text: We were coming from a restaurant in Germantown when we heard some music and decided to go to investigate and saw many, many people seating in front of the Black Rock Center for the Arts having a blast on a concert that was taking place that night , right outside of the facility.It looked like huge family reunion.

title: Love the oysters!
text:
The oysters they sale for $1 outside of the tavern, before 7 pm, are delicious. Maybe this happens only Friday and Saturado, no sure.
We get 18 of them as an appetizer, 2 beers, and something else to complete our dinner.
The food has always been excellent.
We keep coming!

title: Very testy food and pleasant staff.
text:
We ordered a sweet fruity wine that was refreshing and different. Also we selected 4 vegetables and 4 meats that were served in a big plate and we were supposed to eat using our hands holding the food with something similar to a very very soft tortilla.
It was testy, different and we will like to come back .

title: A very nice hotel
text:
When our flight is very early in the morning we arrive to the Aloft hotel the night before, leave the car there and take their shuttle the following morning to the airport.
They come to pick us up at the airport when we return.
Their staff is very nice, the hotel is very clean with a very confortable bed and a spacious room and bathroom.

title: Great Pilot!
text: Flying from Grand Junction Colorado to Denver was a challenge for our pilot due to the weather conditions when for a second the plane was turned side way and our pilot took control of it with so much expertise that he deserves recognition and express gratitude for his flying skills.

title: Good enough!
text:
The place was full when we arrived so we eat at the bar. The bar tender was very nice and attentive.
The food was just good enough.

title: Just beautiful!
text: It is always a big pleasure to see the fountains of Bellagio hotel as they follow and dance with a delightful music. A must see when being in Las Vegas.

title: Update room in a landmark hotel
text:
We checked in on line but the online checking desk was closed after midnight.
From now on we will request a room without a pass door because we could heard happening next door.
The staff was attentive and nice.

title: Wonderful , just wonderful!
text:
This was our second year in a row staying in this gorgeous Victorian B&B.
We were in our way to Capital Reef National Park and decided again to spend the night here in a very confortable bed, beautiful room, having a delicious breakfast and being transported to a Victorian era.
THANK YOU!

title: Great service and delicious food!
text:
The manager of this restaurant us very attentive and provides great service to their customers!
The food was really great and priced reasonably.
Happily, we eat three nights in there.
After a long day hiking and having fun, seeing familiar faces and having a cozy meal was wonderful!
THANK YOU!

title: Amazing views !!!!
text:
We were crossing the Dixie National Forest with snowy trees and amazing views from the top, 9,600 feet.
When coming down we entered to a place out of this world, huge white crocodile skin type mountains, like a blanket extended in every direction.
We went down to hike the Lower Calf Creek Falls... just gorgeous, a must do!

title: Delicious food!
text:
The service was excellent and food very testy, also the prices were reasonable!
They have tables looking at the huge red rocks... when making a reservation ask for one of those.

title: Wonderful views of the huge red rocks!!!
text:
We selected a superior king room with a patio which has a separate/door room with a sleeping sofa. The view from de view is amazing , really marvelous!!!
The resort staff was very very polite and very attentive...THANK YOU!
It will be very nice if they provide bathrobes, at least for certain rooms.
The resort is very close to the Capitol Reef park and to the scenery route # 12

title: An amazing view from the distance!
text:
We visited this March, again, the Acropolis. This time we walked not only inside but all around it, I mean, outside, at the bottom, and the view of such a majestic structure was wonderful.
We also enjoyed very much just walking the streets of the old Athens and the Monastiraki market.
